entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Near blizzard developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:53 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 1:53 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Near blizzard. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending in the morning then mainly sunny. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 1:53 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
